description:
UPDATED to 1.5.

Should work much better with other LoRAs now and give consistent results.

Tags: (>_<:1), closed_eyes

Recommended tags: (chibi:1) - greatly improves stability, I recommend using a lower weight such as 0.5 when making images of other styles. (>3<:1), (>o<:1), (>w<:1) also may give some results.

CFG should stay between 7-11 for best results, sometimes steps over 30 can make the eyes look more like they're normally closed.

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
NEEDS REVISION.

Currently struggles with being used with any other LoRAs. You'll likely also need to use closed eyes, simple eyes in the positive tags, and maybe open eyes in the negatives.

Using v_eyes as a tag seems to increase the likelihood of eyes being open, so I don't recommend using it.
